scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] X-DolbyVoice-Client-LogId: 3339_joinfixed_apoff_mute_apon_unmute.xml X-DolbyVoice-MediaServer-MultiCodec: 0
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 123 110 a=rtpmap:123 Opus/48000/2 a=rtpmap:110 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:110 0-16

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <createconference name="conf_0" deletewhen="nomedia"> <audiomix> <asn ri=" 10s" /> <n-loudest n="4" /> </audiomix> </createconference> </msml>

INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <dialogstart target="conn:[$client_sip_id]" type="application/moml+xml" name="recordname"> <play barge="false" cleardb="true"> <audio uri="file://provisioned/bt/MM2/eng/name_record.wav" /> <audio uri="file://provisioned/bt/MM2/eng/mute_on_beep.wav" /> </play> <record dest="http://10.204.66.28:8081/[$client_sip_id]_placeholder.wav" format="audio/dvcr" maxtime="3s" prespeech="5s" termkey="#"> <recordexit> <exit namelist="record.len" /> </recordexit> </record> </dialogstart> </msml>

INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <dialogstart target="conn:[$client_sip_id]" type="application/moml+xml" name="listen"> <dtmf fdt="0s" idt="5s" edt="5s" cleardb="true"> <pattern digits="min=1;max=24;rtk=#" format="moml+digits"> <exit namelist="dtmf.digits dtmf.end" /> </pattern> <noinput> <exit namelist="dtmf.digits dtmf.end" /> </noinput> <nomatch> <exit namelist="dtmf.digits dtmf.end" /> </nomatch> </dtmf> </dialogstart> </msml>

INFO sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Accept: application/sdp, text/*, application/msml+xml, application/moml+xml Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, PRACK, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, UPDATE, REGISTER, INFO Supported: 100rel Content-Type: application/msml+xml Content-Length: [len]
<msml version="1.1"> <join id1="conn:[$client_sip_id]" id2="conf:conf_0"> <stream dir="to-id1" media="audio"> <clamp dtmf="false" /> <gain amt="0" /> </stream> <stream dir="from-id1" media="audio"> <clamp dtmf="true" /> <gain amt="0" /> </stream> </join>
<dialogstart target="conf:conf_0" type="application/moml+xml" name="[$client_sip_id]_entry"> <play barge="false" cleardb="true"> <audio uri="http://10.204.66.28:8081/[$client_sip_id]_placeholder.wav" /> <audio uri="file://provisioned/bt/MM2/eng/post_name_entry.wav" /> <playexit> <exit namelist="play.end" /> </playexit> </play> </dialogstart> <dialogstart target="conn:[$client_sip_id]" type="application/moml+xml" name="dummy_[$client_sip_id]_instruction"> <dtmfgen digits="6" /> </dialogstart> </msml>

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
